Online consult with online doctors through XCare hotline 1900 1234 is free
Offline consult with doctor is from approximately $100 to $200 per visit
oscopy fees are from approximately $200 to $1000
General surgeries are from approximately $1000 to $10000
Adolescent Package, Under30 Package, Middle Age Package, Senior Package, Premium Package are same price as $1000
All services and packages can be pay by card or cash
